name: Planetar
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Angelic Weapons: The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 5d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).
traits.Divine Awareness: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.
traits.Magic Resistance: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The planetar makes two melee attacks.
actions.Greatsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +12+1d10 + 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.
actions.Healing Touch (4/Day): The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.
